name: Greenbug Campaign Indicators
description: Detects tools and process executions as observed in a Greenbug campaign in May 2020
query: ((process.command_line:/.*[Bb][Ii][Tt][Ss][Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\/[Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Ff][Ee][Rr].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Cc][Ss][Ii][Dd][Ll]_[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa].*/) OR process.command_line:/.*[Cc][Ss][Ii][Dd][Ll]_[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]_[Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee].*/ OR process.command_line:(/.*\\[Mm][Ss][Ff]\.[Pp][Ss]1.*/ OR /.*8989\ \-[Ee]\ [Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\.[Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\.[Ss][Qq][Ll][Cc][Ll][Ii][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Ss][Qq][Ll][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa][Aa][Dd][Aa][Pp][Tt][Ee][Rr]\($[Cc][Mm][Dd]\);\ \[[Vv][Oo][Ii][Dd]\]$[Dd][Aa]\.[Ff][Ii][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*\-[Nn][Oo][Pp]\ \-[Ww]\ [Hh][Ii][Dd][Dd][Ee][Nn]\ \-[Cc]\ $[Kk]\=[Nn][Ee][Ww]\-[Oo][Bb][Jj][Ee][Cc][Tt].*/ OR /.*\[[Nn][Ee][Tt]\.[Cc][Rr][Ee][Dd][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ii][Aa][Ll][Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee]\]\:\:[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt][Cc][Rr][Ee][Dd][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ii][Aa][Ll][Ss];[Ii][Ee][Xx]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Pp]\ \-[Ww]\ [Hh][Ii][Dd][Dd][Ee][Nn]\ \-[Cc]\ $[Mm]\=[Nn][Ee][Ww]\-[Oo][Bb][Jj][Ee][Cc][Tt]\ [Nn][Ee][Tt]\.[Ww][Ee][Bb][Cc][Ll][Ii][Ee][Nn][Tt];$[Mm].*/ OR /.*\-[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa][Cc][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ee]\ \-[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Yy]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss]\ [Ww][Hh][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii].*/ OR /.*\-[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa][Cc][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ee]\ \-[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Yy]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss]\ [Nn][Ee][Tt][Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt]\ \-[Aa].*/ OR /.*[Ll]3[Nn][Ll][Cc][Nn][Zz][Ll][Cc][Jj]1.*/) OR process.executable:(/.*\\[Aa][Dd][Oo][Bb][Ee]\\[Aa][Dd][Oo][Bb][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Rr][Aa][Cc][Ll][Ee]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Rr][Ee][Vv][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*[Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo][Pp][Aa][Gg][Ee][Ss][Bb][Aa][Cc][Kk][Uu][Pp]\\[Nn][Cc][Aa][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*[Cc][Ss][Ii][Dd][Ll]_[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Oo][Rr][Aa][Cc][Ll][Ee]\\[Jj][Aa][Vv][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*[Cc][Ss][Ii][Dd][Ll]_[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Oo][Nn]_[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Ss]\\[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Vv][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.command_line:*bitsadmin* AND process.command_line:*\/transfer* AND process.command_line:*CSIDL_APPDATA*) OR process.command_line:*CSIDL_SYSTEM_DRIVE* OR process.command_line:(*\\msf.ps1* OR *8989\ \-e\ cmd.exe* OR *system.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter\($cmd\);\ \[void\]$da.fill* OR *\-nop\ \-w\ hidden\ \-c\ $k\=new\-object* OR *\[Net.CredentialCache\]\:\:DefaultCredentials;IEX\ * OR *\ \-nop\ \-w\ hidden\ \-c\ $m\=new\-object\ net.webclient;$m* OR *\-noninteractive\ \-executionpolicy\ bypass\ whoami* OR *\-noninteractive\ \-executionpolicy\ bypass\ netstat\ \-a* OR *L3NlcnZlcj1*) OR process.executable:(*\\adobe\\Adobe.exe OR *\\oracle\\local.exe OR *\\revshell.exe OR *infopagesbackup\\ncat.exe OR *CSIDL_SYSTEM\\cmd.exe OR *\\programdata\\oracle\\java.exe OR *CSIDL_COMMON_APPDATA\\comms\\comms.exe OR *\\Programdata\\VMware\\Vmware.exe))`
